metadata.title: CVE-2017-12450 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: The alpha_vms_object_p function in bfd/vms-alpha.c in the Binary FileDescriptor (BFD) library (aka libbfd), as distributed in GNU Binutils 2.29and earlier, allows remote attackers to cause an out of bounds heap writeand possibly achieve code execution via a crafted vms alpha file.

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
